titleStmt.title: A lamentable ballad of the Lady's fall. Tune is, In pescod time.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for W[illiam]. Thackeray, at the Angel in Duck-Lane, E[lizabeth]. M[illet]. and A[lexander]. M[ilbourn].,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Mark well my heavy soleful tale ..."
Place, date of publication and publisher's names from Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University, Houghton Library.
